amendment.description: Add at the end the following new section: SEC. 10. ANNUAL REPORT ON PERFORMANCE AWARDS AND BONUSES AWARDED TO CERTAIN HIGH-LEVEL EMPLOYEES OF THE DEPARTMENT OF VETERANS AFFAIRS. (a) In General- Chapter 7 of title 38, United States Code, is further amended by inserting after section 723, as added by section 5, the following new section: ***.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tenney amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Tenney.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tenney amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
